amendment.description: Amendment expresses as the sense of Congress that the Secretary of Agriculture should release a plan for compensating wheat farmers and handlers affected by the karnal bunt quarantine in Riverside and Imperial Counties of California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 9 in the Congressional Record of June 10, 1996 t express that it is the sense of Congress that USDA should release a detailed compensation plan for wheat farmers and handlers adversely affected by the USDA imposed karnal bunt quarantine of wheat in Riverside and Imperial Counties in California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bono amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
